prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Bass, Piano, Synth Pad, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This song features Drums, Guitar, Bass, Piano, and a Synth Pad, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Bass, Piano, and a Synth Pad, but Pipe is absent.

Style 3:
This piece has Drums, Guitar, Bass, Piano, and a Synth Pad, Pipe excluded.
